subject: Order #SSN4514
description_text:
Hi!
I would like to ask when I can expect the above order to be shipped?
Is it in-stock?
Thank you very much for your answer!
BR,
 Peter

conversations.body_text: Hi Péter Tamás Tóth,    We sincerely apologize that the pedals are currently sold out at our German warehouse. We will ship them to you via DHL after restocking this week and refund your additional shipping fees.

Hi!
Do you possibly see, when the pedals will be in-stock again?
Would it arrive till Christmas?
Thank you, really appreciate your answer!
BR,
 Peter

Hi!
Do you have any news yet?
BR,
 Peter
